content.question: Which of the following can be inferred from the data shown in the graph?

choices.label: After the initial insurgency, Boko Haram became an accepted part of the Nigerian political system.
Northern Nigerians overwhelmingly support Boko Haram and Shariah law.
Boko Haram remains a significant threat to the stability of the Nigerian government.
Western corporations have harmed traditional Nigerian ways, leading to the violence.

content.answer: Boko Haram remains a significant threat to the stability of the Nigerian government.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
